channel.title: [PI]Emptybank[Pi]
channel.description:
I've been trying to code a command that will empty your bank, but everytime i try to compile it i get some type of error
This is the actual command [code] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("emptybank")) { c.getPA().removeAllBank();[/code]
And this is the error i get [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:115: cannot find symbol symbol : method removeAllBank() location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant c.getPA().removeAllBank(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

2.i forgot about a method.
[/quote]

are you kidding me[/quote]
yes i actually was

item.title: [PI]Emptybank[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

[quote=“owner nitro, post:4, topic:395360”]here I whipped up a code method for you just to put in commands.java instead of making a whole method(Ihave tested and this works)

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bankempty")) { for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) { c.bankItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItemsN.length; i++) { c.bankItemsN[i] = 0; } c.getItems().resetBank(); //resetItems(3214); }

Credits to ME please :)[/quote]

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Emptybank[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @owner_nitro owner nitro
item.description:
@owner_nitro wrote:

here I whipped up a code method for you just to put in commands.java instead of making a whole method(Ihave tested and this works)

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bankempty")) { for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) { c.bankItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItemsN.length; i++) { c.bankItemsN[i] = 0; } c.getItems().resetBank(); //resetItems(3214); }

Credits to ME please

Read full topic

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“owner nitro, post:2, topic:395360”]OFFTopic - Why would any one want to empty their bank unless they are quitting?
OT - Did you create a method somewhere for removeAllBank?[/quote]

1.Some people on my server complain that they have to drop all their items to get rid of their bank(yes some people do want to get rid of it).
2.i forgot about a method.
